EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-EmailSeriesPeerng-T003Q5.Email 4.2
EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t let peering upset your gamers and streamers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> EPE ensures your gamers get the best experiences Read our egress peering use case <[[http://pf.content.nokia.com/webscale-peering-hub/peering-epe-use-case?lb_email={{lead.Email Address}}&did=d000000001ej&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-marketo-webscale&utm_medium=email&utm_content=epe-use-case&utm_term=peering-follow-up]]> to see why Richard McIntosh‏ @802Tophat <[[https://twitter.com/802Tophat/status/1095858126547341312]]> was impressed that our peering solution can set traffic flows to autopilot and allow flows to be configured automatically based on latency and path computation. Find out how to keep your gamers and streamers happy. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
